name: Selective Focus
description:
"Selective focus is a method in which the focus is narrowed down to the focal point while leaving all other elements in the frame out-of-focus."

...on close ups it can produce detailed, very nice high-res, sharp focus areas! (if you experience "over-sharpened" parts: use negative prompts to eliminate them - check my sample images!)

...for some reason it has an asian tendency...
